parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1 </name>=<value> 1.54

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns mouse position in UI coordinates.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''getMousePosition'''

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - position in format [x, y], where x and y are UI coordinates
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getMousePosition]] [[params]] ["_x", "_y"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMousePosition]], [[ctrlMapCursor]], [[reversedMouseY]]
</value></part></template></root>
